item.title: The basic principle of DESeq2 (1)
item.author: Author
item.description: How DESeq2 calculate DEGs? DESeq2 tool was published in 2014 and it has been cited more than 30,000 times. (reference) DESeq2 is a method for differential analysis of count data, using shrinkage estimation for dispersions and fold changes to improve the stability and interpretability of estimates. Library normalization by DEGs (median of ratios method) RPKM, FPKM, TPM…… Those are methods for adjusting for the difference in overall read counts among libraries.
